import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faBook, faChalkboardTeacher, faHeadphones } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { Tooltip } from 'react-tooltip'; const Lessons = () => { const [activeCategory, setActiveCategory] = useState('Intermediate'); const [progress, setProgress] = useState({ Beginner: 0, Intermediate: 50, Advanced: 20, }); const handleQuizCompletion = (category) => { setProgress((prevProgress) => ({ ...prevProgress, [category]: prevProgress[category] + 10, })); }; return (
Click to see beginner lessons Click to see intermediate lessons Click to see advanced lessons
{activeCategory === 'Beginner' && (

handleQuizCompletion('Beginner')} />
)} {activeCategory === 'Intermediate' && (

handleQuizCompletion('Intermediate')} />
)} {activeCategory === 'Advanced' && (

Advanced Lessons

Advanced Exercises

handleQuizCompletion('Advanced')} />
)}

Progress

Beginner: {progress.Beginner}%

Intermediate: {progress.Intermediate}%

Advanced: {progress.Advanced}%

); }; const LessonPreviews = () => (

); const Exercises = ({ category, onComplete }) => (

); export default Lessons;
